name: Bulbasaur
entry: It can go for days without eating a single morsel. In the bulb on its back, it stores energy.

name: Ivysaur
entry: The bulb on its back grows by drawing energy. It gives off an aroma when it is ready to bloom.

name: Venusaur
entry: The flower on its back catches the sun’s rays. The sunlight is then absorbed and used for energy.

name: Charmander
entry: The flame at the tip of its tail makes a sound as it burns. You can only hear it in quiet places.

name: Charmeleon
entry: Tough fights could excite this POKéMON. When excited, it may blow out bluish-white flames.

name: Charizard
entry: When expelling a blast of super hot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.

name: Squirtle
entry: Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.

name: Wartortle
entry: When tapped, this POKéMON will pull in its head, but its tail will still stick out a little bit.

name: Blastoise
entry: Once it takes aim at its enemy, it blasts out water with even more force than a fire hose.

name: Caterpie
entry: If you touch the feeler on top of its head, it will release a horrible stink to protect itself.

name: Metapod
entry: Hardens its shell to protect itself. However, a large impact may cause it to pop out of its shell.

name: Butterfree
entry: Its wings, covered with poisonous powders, repel water. This allows it to fly in the rain.

name: Weedle
entry: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.

name: Kakuna
entry: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.

name: Beedrill
entry: It has 3 poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

name: Pidgey
entry: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.

name: Pidgeotto
entry: This POKéMON is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.

name: Pidgeot
entry: This POKéMON flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.

name: Rattata
entry: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, it is certain that 40 more live in the area.

name: Raticate
entry: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.

name: Spearow
entry: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.

name: Fearow
entry: A POKéMON that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.

name: Ekans
entry: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.

name: Arbok
entry: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

name: Pikachu
entry: It keeps its tail raised to monitor its surroundings. If you yank its tail, it will try to bite you.

name: Raichu
entry: When electricity builds up inside its body, it becomes feisty. It also glows in the dark.

name: Sandshrew
entry: Its body is dry. When it gets cold at night, its hide is said to become coated with a fine dew.

name: Sandslash
entry: It is skilled at slashing enemies with its claws. If broken, they start to grow back in a day.

name: Nidoran♀
entry: A mild-mannered POKéMON that does not like to fight. Beware, its small horns secrete venom.

name: Nidorina
entry: When resting deep in its burrow, its thorns always retract. This is proof that it is relaxed.

name: Nidoqueen
entry: Tough scales cover the sturdy body of this POKéMON. It appears that the scales grow in cycles.

name: Nidoran♂
entry: Its large ears are always kept upright. If it senses danger, it will attack with a poisonous sting.

name: Nidorino
entry: Its horns contain venom. If they are stabbed into an enemy, the impact makes the poison leak out.

name: Nidoking
entry: Its steel-like hide adds to its powerful tackle. Its horns are so hard, they can pierce a diamond.

name: Clefairy
entry: Adored for their cute looks and playfulness. They are thought to be rare, as they do not appear often.

name: Clefable
entry: They appear to be very protective of their own world. It is a kind of fairy, rarely seen by people.

name: Vulpix
entry: Both its fur and its tails are beautiful. As it grows, the tails split and form more tails.

name: Ninetales
entry: According to an enduring legend, 9 noble saints were united and reincarnated as this POKéMON.

name: Jigglypuff
entry: Uses its alluring eyes to enrapture its foe. It then sings a pleasing melody that lulls the foe to sleep.

name: Wigglytuff
entry: Its body is full of elasticity. By inhaling deeply, it can continue to inflate itself without limit.

name: Zubat
entry: Emits ultrasonic cries while it flies. They act as a sonar used to check for objects in its way.

name: Golbat
entry: It attacks in a stealthy manner, without warning. Its sharp fangs are used to bite and suck blood.

name: Oddish
entry: It may be mistaken for a clump of weeds. If you try to yank it out of the ground, it shrieks horribly.

name: Gloom
entry: Smells incredibly foul! However, around 1 out of 1,000 people enjoy sniffing its nose-bending stink.

name: Vileplume
entry: Flaps its broad flower petals to scatter its poisonous pollen. The flapping sound is very loud.

name: Paras
entry: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.

name: Parasect
entry: The bug host is drained of energy by the mushrooms on its back. They appear to do all the thinking.

name: Venonat
entry: Its large eyes act as radars. In a bright place, you can see that they are clusters of many tiny eyes.

name: Venomoth
entry: The powdery scales on its wings are hard to remove. They also contain poison that leaks out on contact.

name: Diglett
entry: It prefers dark places. It spends most of its time underground, though it may pop up in caves.

name: Dugtrio
entry: A team of triplets that can burrow over 60 MPH. Due to this, some people think it’s an earthquake.

name: Meowth
entry: Appears to be more active at night. It loves round and shiny things. It can’t stop from picking them up.

name: Persian
entry: The gem in its forehead glows on its own! It walks with all the grace and elegance of a proud queen.

name: Psyduck
entry: Always tormented by headaches. It uses psychic powers, but it is not known if it intends to do so.

name: Golduck
entry: Its slim and long limbs end in broad flippers. They are used for swimming gracefully in lakes.

name: Mankey
entry: An agile POKéMON that lives in trees. It angers easily and will not hesitate to attack anything.

name: Primeape
entry: It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult.

name: Growlithe
entry: A POKéMON with a friendly nature. However, it will bark fiercely at anything invading its territory.

name: Arcanine
entry: A legendary POKéMON in China. Many people are charmed by its grace and beauty while running.

name: Poliwag
entry: The direction of the spiral on the belly differs by area. It is more adept at swimming than walking.

name: Poliwhirl
entry: Under attack, it uses its belly spiral to put the foe to sleep. It then makes its escape.

name: Poliwrath
entry: Swims powerfully using all the muscles in its body. It can even overtake champion swimmers.

name: Abra
entry: Sleeps 18 hours a day. If it senses danger, it will teleport itself to safety even as it sleeps.

name: Kadabra
entry: Many odd things happen if this POKéMON is close by. For example, it makes clocks run backwards.

name: Alakazam
entry: A POKéMON that can memorize anything. It never forgets what it learns--that’s why this POKéMON is smart.

name: Machop
entry: Very powerful in spite of its small size. Its mastery of many types of martial arts makes it very tough.

name: Machoke
entry: The belt around its waist holds back its energy. Without it, this POKéMON would be unstoppable.

name: Machamp
entry: One arm alone can move mountains. Using all four arms, this POKéMON fires off awesome punches.

name: Bellsprout
entry: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny insects with its vines and devours them.

name: Weepinbell
entry: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is melted inside by strong acids.

name: Victreebel
entry: Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is melted in a day, bones and all.

name: Tentacool
entry: It can sometimes be found all dry and shriveled up on a beach. Toss it back into the sea to revive it.

name: Tentacruel
entry: Its 80 tentacles can stretch and contract freely. They wrap around prey and weaken it with poison.

name: Geodude
entry: Commonly found near mountain trails, etc. If you step on one by accident, it gets angry.

name: Graveler
entry: Often seen rolling down mountain trails. Obstacles are just things to roll straight over, not avoid.

name: Golem
entry: Once it sheds its skin, its body turns tender and whitish. Its hide hardens when it’s exposed to air.

name: Ponyta
entry: Capable of jumping incredibly high. Its hooves and sturdy legs absorb the impact of a hard landing.

name: Rapidash
entry: Just loves to run. If it sees something faster than itself, it will give chase at top speed.

name: Slowpoke
entry: Incredibly slow and sluggish. It is quite content to loll about without worrying about the time.

name: Slowbro
entry: Lives lazily by the sea. If the SHELLDER on its tail comes off, it becomes a SLOWPOKE again.

name: Magnemite
entry: It is born with the ability to defy gravity. It floats in air on powerful electromagnetic waves.

name: Magneton
entry: Generates strange radio signals. It raises the temperature by 3.6F degrees within 3,300 feet.

name: Farfetch'd
entry: Lives where reedy plants grow. They are rarely seen, so it’s thought their numbers are decreasing.

name: Doduo
entry: Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this POKéMON runs at high speed on developed legs.

name: Dodrio
entry: One of DODUO’s 2 heads splits to form a unique species. It runs close to 40 MPH in prairies.

name: Seel
entry: One of DODUO’s 2 heads splits to form a unique species. It runs close to 40 MPH in prairies.

name: Dewgong
entry: Its entire body is a snowy-white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.

name: Grimer
entry: Made of hardened sludge. It smells too putrid to touch. Even weeds won’t grow in its path.

name: Muk
entry: Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration, it lost its sense of smell.

name: Shellder
entry: The shell can withstand any attack. However, when it is open, the tender body is exposed.

name: Cloyster
entry: For protection, it uses its harder-than-diamonds shell. It also shoots spikes from the shell.

name: Gastly
entry: Said to appear in decrepit, deserted buildings. It has no real shape as it appears to be made of a gas.

name: Haunter
entry: By licking, it saps the victim’s life. It causes shaking that won’t stop until the victim’s demise.

name: Gengar
entry: A GENGAR is close by if you feel a sudden chill. It may be trying to lay a curse on you.

name: Onix
entry: Burrows at high speed in search of food. The tunnels it leaves are used as homes by DIGLETTs.

name: Drowzee
entry: If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it has eaten in the past.

name: Hypno
entry: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.

name: Krabby
entry: Its pincers are superb weapons. They sometimes break off during battle, but they grow back fast.

name: Kingler
entry: One claw grew massively and as hard as steel. It has 10,000-HP strength. However, it is too heavy.

name: Voltorb
entry: It is said to camouflage itself as a POKé BALL. It will self-destruct with very little stimulus.

name: Electrode
entry: Stores electrical energy inside its body. Even the slightest shock could trigger a huge explosion.

name: Exeggcute
entry: The heads attract each other and spin around. There must be 6 heads for it to maintain balance.

name: Exeggutor
entry: Its cries are very noisy. This is because each of the 3 heads thinks about whatever it likes.

name: Cubone
entry: Wears the skull of its deceased mother. Its cries echo inside the skull and come out as a sad melody.

name: Marowak
entry: Small and weak, this POKéMON is adept with its bone club. It has grown more vicious over the ages.

name: Hitmonlee
entry: When kicking, the sole of its foot turns as hard as a diamond on impact and destroys its enemy.

name: Hitmonchan
entry: Punches in corkscrew fashion. It can punch its way through a concrete wall in the same way as a drill.

name: Lickitung
entry: Its tongue spans almost 7 feet and moves more freely than its forelegs. Its licks can cause paralysis.

name: Koffing
entry: In hot places, its internal gases could expand and explode without any warning. Be very careful!

name: Weezing
entry: It lives and grows by absorbing dust, germs and poison gases that are contained in toxic waste and garbage.

name: Rhyhorn
entry: A POKéMON with a one-track mind. Once it charges, it won’t stop running until it falls asleep.

name: Rhydon
entry: Walks on its hind legs. Shows signs of intelligence. Its armor-like hide even repels molten lava.

name: Chansey
entry: A gentle and kindhearted POKéMON that shares its nutritious eggs if it sees an injured POKéMON.

name: Tangela
entry: Its identity is obscured by masses of thick, blue vines. The vines are said to never stop growing.

name: Kangaskhan
entry: Raises its young in its belly pouch. Won’t run from any fight to keep its young protected.

name: Horsea
entry: If it senses any danger, it will vigorously spray water or a special type of ink from its mouth.

name: Seadra
entry: Touching the back fin causes numbness. It hooks its tail to coral to stay in place while sleeping.

name: Goldeen
entry: When it is time for them to lay eggs, they can be seen swimming up rivers and falls in large groups.

name: Seaking
entry: It is the male’s job to make a nest by carving out boulders in a stream using the horn on its head.

name: Staryu
entry: As long as the center section is unharmed, it can grow back fully even if it is chopped to bits.

name: Starmie
entry: The center section is named the core. People think it is communicating when it glows in 7 colors.

name: Mr. Mime
entry: Always practices its pantomime act. It makes enemies believe something exists that really doesn’t.

name: Scyther
entry: Leaps out of tall grass and slices prey with its scythes. The movement looks like that of a ninja.

name: Jynx
entry: Appears to move to a rhythm of its own, as if it were dancing. It wiggles its hips as it walks.

name: Electabuzz
entry: If a major power outage occurs, it is certain that this POKéMON has eaten electricity at a power plant.

name: Magmar
entry: Born in an active volcano. Its body is always cloaked in flames, so it looks like a big ball of fire.

name: Pinsir
entry: Grips its prey in its pincers and squeezes hard! It can’t move if it’s cold, so it lives in warm places.

name: Tauros
entry: A rowdy POKéMON with a lot of stamina. Once running, it won’t stop until it hits something.

name: Magikarp
entry: Famous for being very unreliable. It can be found swimming in seas, lakes, rivers and shallow puddles.

name: Gyarados
entry: Brutally vicious and enormously destructive. Known for totally destroying cities in ancient times.

name: Lapras
entry: A gentle soul that can read the minds of people. It can ferry people across the sea on its back.

name: Ditto
entry: When it spots an enemy, its body transfigures into an almost perfect copy of its opponent.

name: Eevee
entry: Its genetic code is unstable, so it could evolve in a variety of ways. There are only a few alive.

name: Vaporeon
entry: Its cell structure is similar to water molecules. It will melt away and become invisible in water.

name: Jolteon
entry: A sensitive POKéMON that easily becomes sad or angry. Every time its mood changes, it charges power.

name: Flareon
entry: It has a flame chamber inside its body. It inhales, then blows out fire that is over 3,000F degrees.

name: Porygon
entry: The only POKéMON people anticipate can fly into space. None has managed the feat yet, however.

name: Omanyte
entry: An ancient POKéMON that was recovered from a fossil. It swims by cleverly twisting its 10 tentacles about.

name: Omastar
entry: Sharp beaks ring its mouth. Its shell was too big for it to move freely, so it became extinct.

name: Kabuto
entry: A POKéMON that was recovered from a fossil. It uses the eyes on its back while hiding on the sea floor.

name: Kabutops
entry: A slim and fast swimmer. It slices its prey with its sharp sickles and drinks the body fluids.

name: Aerodactyl
entry: A savage POKéMON that died out in ancient times. It was resurrected using DNA taken from amber.

name: Snorlax
entry: Will eat anything, even if the food happens to be a little moldy. It never gets an upset stomach.

name: Articuno
entry: A legendary bird POKéMON. It freezes water that is contained in winter air and makes it snow.

name: Zapdos
entry: This legendary bird POKéMON is said to appear when the sky turns dark and lightning showers down.

name: Moltres
entry: A legendary bird POKéMON. As it flaps its flaming wings, even the night sky will turn red.

name: Dratini
entry: The existence of this mythical POKéMON was only recently confirmed by a fisherman who caught one.

name: Dragonair
entry: According to a witness, its body was surrounded by a strange aura that gave it a mystical look.

name: Dragonite
entry: It is said that this POKéMON lives somewhere in the sea and that it flies. However, it is only a rumor.

name: Mewtwo
entry: Its DNA is almost the same as MEW’s. However, its size and disposition are vastly different.

name: Mew
entry: When viewed through a microscope, this POKéMON’s short, fine, delicate hair can be seen.
